entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
